sn21.6:1: Sāvatthiyaṁ vihārati. Atha kho āyasmā lakuṇḍakabhaddiyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami. Addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ lakuṇḍakabhaddiyaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ. Disvāna bhikkhū āmantesi: "passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṁ bhikkhuṁ āgacchantaṁ dubbaṇṇaṁ duddasikaṁ okoṭimakaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ paribhūtarūpan"ti?
sn21.6:2: "Haṁsā koñcā mayūrā ca,hatthayo pasadā migā;Sabbe sīhassa bhāyanti,natthi kāyasmiṁ tulyatā.
sn21.6:3: Evameva manussesu,daharo cepi paññavā;So hi tattha mahā hoti,neva bālo sarīravā"ti.
